title: Document in a Shared Care Plan
description: A home health nurse visits a patient and needs to add a note to the shared care plan that is visible to the patient's PCP and other specialists.

tasks.description: Open the patient's shared care plan.
tasks.expected_outcome: The nurse accesses the collaborative care plan document.

tasks.description: Create a new progress note within the care plan.
tasks.expected_outcome: The nurse begins a new entry.

tasks.description: Document their findings from the home visit and save the note.
tasks.expected_outcome: The note is saved to the shared plan, and other members of the care team are notified of the update.
